commitMessage:
@@@Convert abbreviation data to CSV and adapt JabRef accordingly (#5538)

* Convert abbreviation files to CSV format
* Update parser and writer for journal files and add 'shortest abbrv' support
* Add SHORTEST abbrv to the menu bar
* Update abbrv-related tests
* Fix Javadoc
* Fix and improve tests
* Add an EMPTY constant to StringUtil
* Update abbreviation parser and writer
* Expanding tests.  reviewing legacy code.  improving UI...

@@@Rework journal abbreviation caching (#6304)

* Rework journal abbreviation caching

* Add ADR-0010

* Remove IEEE abbreviations

* Convert abbreviations as part of build process

* Fix tests

* Update according to review feedback

* Fix bug

* Include feedback

* Fix test

* Fix localization

Co-authored-by: Oliver Kopp <kopp.dev@gmail.com>
